name: Rozalind Wood
text: A really cool place to stop by for that small town feeling! Pizza is great and not over priced at all once you actually see it you will understand lots of cheese and toppings unlike other places that weighs out everything! Leroy the owner …More

name: Donald MacDougall
text: a wonderful place to go be sure to talk to Leroy because he will give you all the hell you'll need for the day month maybe the year great man to talk to you'll enjoy his company if you don't you're the one that's got a problem

name: Robin Watenpaugh
text: Lived up to its name.  Came through in the clutch.  Friendly staff.

name: Susan Moya
text: Beer is 24.50 12 pack, 18 packs 35.00, nice people, 8 miles from cliff, only liquor store unless you go to Silver City

name: Lindsay Rohler
text: This is the only "store" for MILES. It serves Pizza, Burgers, and a few other items but is set up more like a concession stand vs. A restaurant. The pizza wasnt all that bad, but not worth the price. I am assuming it is because there is …More

name: Sam Pitts
text: Good homemade hamburger buns and homemade biscuits
